issue.title: [Rust] Support temporal data types in JSON reader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9908](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9908). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the JSON reader does not support any temporal data types. Columns with **numerical** data should be interpretable as temporal type when defined accordingly in the schema. Currently this would throw an error with a misleading message ("struct types are not yet supported").

related issue:

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4803 focuses on parsing temporal data based on strings inputs.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9908?focusedCommentId=17191852) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8124
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8124>
